description: This Java class defines a global exception handler for a Spring Boot application, managing specific and generic exceptions and returning structured error responses.

classes.name: GlobalExceptionHandler
classes.description: A Spring RestControllerAdvice that handles exceptions globally across controllers.

methods.name: handleNoteNotFound
methods.description: Handles NoteNotFoundException and returns a 404 NOT_FOUND response.

methods.name: handleOther
methods.description: Handles generic Exception and returns a 500 INTERNAL_SERVER_ERROR response.

methods.name: handleMethodArgumentNotValid
methods.description: Overrides default to handle validation errors and returns a 400 BAD_REQUEST response with field error details.

methods.name: messageFor
methods.description: Constructs a validation error message for a FieldError.

methods.name: build
methods.description: Constructs a ResponseEntity with a structured error body containing timestamp, status, error code, message, and optional field errors.
